properties.areaDesc: Tidal Potomac from Key Bridge to Indian Head MD; Tidal Potomac from Indian Head to Cobb Island MD
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 18 at 8:48PM EST until January 19 at 3:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore MD/Washington DC
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the first Small Craft Advisory, southwest winds 10
to 15 kt with gusts up to 25 kt. For the second Small Craft
Advisory, northwest winds 10 to 15 kt with gusts up to 20 kt
expected.

* WHERE...Tidal Potomac River from Key Bridge to Cobb Island MD.

* WHEN...Until 3 AM EST Sunday, and again from noon to 6 PM EST
Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM EST SUNDAY... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 6 PM EST SUNDAY
